metadata.title: Universal Gamma Scaling: Unified Information-Density Theory (UIDT v3.7.2) - Canonical Framework (Clean State)
metadata.description: Canonical Reference (v3.7.2 - Clean State). Complete Manuscript establishing the Three-Pillar Architecture (QFT, Cosmology, Lab). Features analytical derivation of the Yang-Mills Mass Gap (1.710 GeV), CSF-UIDT Synthesis, SMDS model, and 99-step RG vacuum suppression. Scientifically Closed Framework. CORRECTIONS IN v3.7.2: Vacuum Expectation Value (VEV) rectified to 47.7 MeV; Casimir effect reclassified to 'predicted, unverified' (Category D); H₀ unified to 70.4 km/s/Mpc; holographic normalization (π⁻²) explicitly documented.
metadata.notes: Integrity Note: This version (v3.7.2) formally supersedes all previous releases (v3.6, v3.5.x, v3.3). Clean State established after v3.3 withdrawal due to external formatting errors. All corrections documented in CHANGELOG.md.
